name: Patryk Zaslawski
profile_summary: As an accomplished Senior Back-End Engineer with 8+ years of software engineering experience, I excel in designing and implementing robust microservices architectures utilizing **Kotlin**, **Spring Boot**, **Gradle**, and **GraphQL**. My proficiency in cloud technologies, particularly **AWS**, allows me to develop scalable solutions that meet high-performance standards. I have hands-on experience with container orchestration using **Kubernetes** and **Docker**, along with asynchronous messaging via **RabbitMQ**. Additionally, I am skilled in using **Liquibase** for database versioning and enhancements, ensuring reliable data management. My expertise includes monitoring and performance analytics with **ElasticSearch**, **Grafana**, and **Prometheus**. I am an advocate of Agile methodologies, particularly **SCRUM**, and adept in CI/CD practices using **GitLab CI/CD**. Beyond technical skills, I bring strong communication and teamwork abilities, contributing to effective cross-functional collaboration. I am also comfortable working with **Keycloak** for identity management and have experience with **PostGIS** to handle geospatial data.
